title: Niue: Taloa Heights
inclusions_evidence: Includes 7 nights at Taloa Heights - FREE Wi-Fi - Complimentary return airport transfers - Use of snorkeling gear and mountain bikes (subject to availability).; Per Person, from $1,050

items.label: Use of snorkeling gear and mountain bikes (subject to availability)

other.notes: No supplier/OTA pricing available from provided text to construct DIY cost for these extras; prices not independently sourced.

reasoning: Cannot reliably obtain DIY prices from the provided page text so numeric comparison is not possible. The package is hotel-only (flights not included per page text) and includes complimentary return airport transfers and gear use, which increases value versus booking a room alone. At 1050 per person (2100 for two) for 7 nights at Taloa Heights this appears reasonably priced for Niue, but without independent hotel or airfare quotes the precise savings cannot be computed.
additional_notes: Deal valid for sales to 24 Mar 2026 (per page text). Per-person pricing is twin-share; hotel costs and transfers are not broken out on the page. Nights are within the 21-night limit.
